title: riot is a complete joke
body: Its not actually possible for my mmr or elo to drop 400 within 10 provisional games from fucking platinum to fucking silver. You need to fix your problems with the ranked systems.

replies.body: my mmr was the average for the league...

Yes it actually is.

You're making the assumption that being plat 5 means you actually had plat MMR, you likely had mid gold MMR and then lost half your provisionals.

I was Plat V last season. Assumed my MMR was roughly Gold 3 level due to a massive loss streak. Went 4-6 in placements, got Silver 1. 

I'm not whinging and making a forum thread about it. Accept it and climb back up. If you are a Plat player than Silver and Low Gold should be a cake walk.

You never know your real MMR. You can't rely on third party sources so much because they can only estimate. Though, from those estimates, you were at the very very bottom of Plat; a lot of people lost a whole tier of MMR, so it's not surprising if you lost just a little more and ended in Silver. To avoid this next time, you need to raise your MMR/Rank up more than just the bare minimum.

Besides, you will be getting good LP gains, and if you're really Plat level you'll climb up fast. You can be there in no time flat.
